title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for expression of A(t)

1 point is earned for expression of A'(t)

1 point is earned for answering with units

A(t)= π (R(t))2

A'(t)=2 π R(t)R'(t)

A'(3)=8.858 cm2 /year
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for expression of A(t)

1 point is earned for expression of A'(t)

1 point is earned for answering with units

A(t)= π (R(t))2

A'(t)=2 π R(t)R'(t)

A'(3)=8.858 cm2 /year

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for expression of A(t)

1 point is earned for expression of A'(t)

1 point is earned for answering with units

A(t)= π (R(t))2

A'(t)=2 π R(t)R'(t)

A'(3)=8.858 cm2 /year

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for expression of A(t)

1 point is earned for expression of A'(t)

1 point is earned for answering with units

A(t)= π (R(t))2

A'(t)=2 π R(t)R'(t)

A'(3)=8.858 cm2 /year

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for expression of A(t)

1 point is earned for expression of A'(t)

1 point is earned for answering with units

A(t)= π (R(t))2

A'(t)=2 π R(t)R'(t)
